00027 // We are going to use unix conventions in the internal format
00028 // and translate them to the os requirements only as needed.
00029 // so we define these here.
00030 // They are not contitional on the platform. (unix & win32)
00031 #define FSPATH_PATHSEP "/"
00032 #define FSPATH_INTERNAL_PATHSEP ":"
00033 #define FSPATH_EXTSEP "."
00034
